statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyProduction WHERE production_id = 1;
SELECT production_date, energy_source FROM EnergyProduction WHERE energy_production > 100;
SELECT production_id, energy_source, energy_production FROM EnergyProduction WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT energy_source, SUM(energy_production) AS total_production FROM EnergyProduction GROUP BY energy_source;
SELECT * FROM EnergyProduction ORDER BY production_date DESC, energy_production ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM EnergyProduction WHERE energy_source='Solar' ORDER BY production_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT production_id, energy_source, SUM(energy_production) AS total_production FROM EnergyProduction GROUP BY energy_source ORDER BY total_production DESC
SELECT * FROM EnergyProduction WHERE YEAR(production_date)=2021 ORDER BY production_id ASC
SELECT production_id, energy_source, energy_production FROM EnergyProduction WHERE energy_production > 100 ORDER BY energy_production DESC
SELECT production_id, energy_source, production_date FROM EnergyProduction WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production;
SELECT id, energy_source FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE production_amount > 1000;
SELECT location, consumption_amount FROM energy_consumption WHERE location='New York';
SELECT energy_source, SUM(production_amount) AS total_production FROM renewable_energy_production GROUP BY energy_source;
SELECT id, MAX(consumption_amount) AS max_consumption FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE production_amount > 1000
SELECT energy_source, production_amount FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE energy_source = 'Solar'
SELECT id, energy_source, production_amount FROM renewable_energy_production ORDER BY production_amount DESC
SELECT id, location, consumption_amount FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY consumption_amount ASC
SELECT energy_source, SUM(production_amount) AS total_production FROM renewable_energy_production GROUP BY energy_source
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT production_id, renewable_source, production_amount FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE production_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption_amount < 500 ORDER BY consumption_date ASC;
SELECT impact_amount, production_id, consumption_id FROM energy_impact WHERE impact_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT production_date, renewable_source FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE renewable_source = 'Solar';
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE production_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT production_date, production_amount FROM renewable_energy_production ORDER BY production_date DESC
SELECT SUM(production_amount) AS total_production FROM renewable_energy_production
SELECT production_id, renewable_source, production_amount FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE renewable_source = 'Wind'
SELECT production_date, production_amount FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE production_amount > 100 ORDER BY production_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM energy_production;
SELECT production_id, production_date, energy_source, energy_output FROM energy_production ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT production_id, energy_source, energy_output FROM energy_production WHERE energy_output > 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_sources WHERE source_type = 'Renewable';
SELECT analysis_id, impact_score FROM impact_analysis ORDER BY impact_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM energy_production ORDER BY production_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT production_date, energy_source, energy_output FROM energy_production WHERE energy_source = 'Solar' AND energy_output > 1000 ORDER BY energy_output DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT ep.production_date, ec.location, ea.impact_score FROM energy_production ep JOIN energy_analysis ea ON ep.production_id = ea.production_id JOIN energy_consumption ec ON ea.consumption_id = ec.consumption_id WHERE ea.impact_score > 0.8 ORDER BY ea.impact_score DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT ep.production_date AS Date, es.source_name AS Source, ec.location AS Location, ea.impact_score AS Score FROM energy_production ep JOIN energy_analysis ea ON ep.production_id = ea.production_id JOIN energy_consumption ec ON ea.consumption_id = ec.consumption_id JOIN energy_sources es ON ep.energy_source = es.source_id ORDER BY Date ASC, Score DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT DISTINCT ec.location, SUM(ec.energy_used) AS Total_Energy_Used, es.source_type FROM energy_consumption ec JOIN energy_sources es ON ec.location = es.source_name GROUP BY ec.location, es.source_type HAVING Total_Energy_Used > 500 ORDER BY Total_Energy_Used DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production;
SELECT production_date, production_amount FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE production_source = 'Solar';
SELECT SUM(production_amount) AS total_production FROM renewable_energy_production;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY consumption_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM location WHERE location_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production;
SELECT production_date, production_amount FROM renewable_energy_production ORDER BY production_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption_type = 'Residential' AND consumption_amount > 1000;
SELECT production_id, consumption_id, impact_value FROM production_impact WHERE impact_value < 500 ORDER BY impact_value ASC;
SELECT source_name, source_type, source_description FROM energy_sources WHERE source_type = 'Solar' LIMIT 5;
